name: Charles COLEMAN, et al., petitioners, v. CAMPBELL COUNTY LIBRARY BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
name_abbreviation: Coleman v. Campbell Cnty. Library Bd. of Trs.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Charles COLEMAN, et al., petitioners,
v.
CAMPBELL COUNTY LIBRARY BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
attorneys: Motion of The New England Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Kentucky denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Charles COLEMAN, et al., petitioners,
v.
CAMPBELL COUNTY LIBRARY BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
No. 18-283.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 13, 2018.
Motion of The New England Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Kentucky denied.
